pages.text: This is not an ordinary slab, it is attached to the soul of the ancient maid.$(br2)Each player will get a slab when they are spawn, right click to release a maid.

The slab can be reused, you can right-click on the maid to put it back into the slab. In the dungeon loot chest, smart slab can also be found very rarely.$(br2)You can disable the above two slabs acquisition methods through configuration, and the slabs will also be restricted by the "maximum number of player maids" configuration.
